text: Tau: Corrective action will be taken. #BridgeCollapse
Jhb Mayor Parks Tau says it's not clear if M1highway which has been closed due to #BridgeCollapse will be open for traffic tomorrow.
Now Murray and Roberts is treating us like idiots - "gust of wind" really?  #bridgecollapse
Metrobus will be maximising services tomorrow due to m1 closure. It will also redirect services usually using m1 #bridgecollapse
Mayor Tau says they will be visiting victims in various hospitals tomorrow @ANN7tv #BridgeCollapse #Grayston

We understand the contractor Murray and Roberts is responding proactively to the construction incident  on Grayston 

#Bridgecollapse ^TK
#BridgeCollapse Parks: We are encouraged by the fact that investigation institutions are already on site. #SABCNews

#BridgeCollapse Tau : We have told the team to investigate, we are encouraged by fact that major institutions are here to probe.
